official_title: To amend section 7(m) of the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to eliminate the partial overtime exemption for employees that perform services necessary and incidental to the sale and processing of green and cigar leaf tobacco.

summary.text: Tobacco Workers Equity Act - Amends the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to repeal the partial overtime exemption for employees who perform services necessary and incidental to the sale and processing of green and cigar leaf tobacco.

titles.title: To amend section 7(m) of the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to eliminate the partial overtime exemption for employees that perform services necessary and incidental to the sale and processing of green and cigar leaf tobacco.
